title: The Sims 2 Base Game with All Expansions 2click Easiest Install
description:
- This download does it ALL for you :)

Just be amazed!!!

- This is REAL !! (I Promise there are NO VIRUSES, NO BS, AT ALL! JUST GREAT GAME!) And this installs ALL Base Game AND ALL Sims 2 Expansions (EXCEPT THE BODY SHOP, I DIDN'T PUT THE REGISTRY KEYS IN FOR THAT)

-This is the full game of Sims 2 with all expansions and service packs installed. Basically this unpacks the full game, and makes the required registry keys automatically. Thereby dodging all serial inputs :).

INSTALLATION STEPS FOR NOVICE INSTALLERS ::

Step 1: 'Get this Torrent' 
Step 2: Associate it with your already installed Torrent Program (Utorrent, Bittorrent, etc.)
Step 3: Download as fast as possible, lol. (Find extra TRACKERS using this HASH TAG in a Google.com search, and getting different websites download of THIS same file. Add trackers. [ADDITIONAL TRACKERS = COMPLETELY OPTIONAL FOR FASTER DOWNLOAD]
Step 4: USE WinRAR, or WinZip, or 7-Zip, or any Flie Extraction Program to EXTRACT TO the .zip file contents to anywhere on your computer...
Step 5: You will see a Sims 2 All-in-One folder with DirectX9.0 Folder (with contents), 8 Pack1 Files, and 1 Pack 2 File (DO NOTHING WITH THESE PACK FILES), and a Sims 2 AIO Installer Application File.
Step 6: Double-Click on the 'Sims 2 AIO Installer' App File (The cool iconed installation package file).
Step 7: Let it do all the magic for you :)
Step 8: GET DirectX 9.0 (IF you believe you have no DirectX on your computer, otherwise say NO to it!! odds are you should just say NO to it, you SHOULD already have it). If you come to find out you DONT HAVE DIRECTX9.0 or NEWER INSTALLED ON YOUR COMPUTER, AFTER INSTALLATION... Just uninstall and re-run this Sims2AIO Installer INSTALLATION, and say YES to DirectX9.0 Installation (included). Easy...
Step 9: Double-Click on the DESKTOP ICON that appears AFTER the installation.
Step 10: In-game, pick a town, and click on the '+' signed expansion pack icons on top left of Sims 2 game screen, to add EACH expansion TO that town. 
Enjoy the game YA'ALL :)

-This installs :: The Sims 2 Base Game, with all expansions listed above AUTOMATICALLY FOR YOU :), and an uninstaller, to your Program Files > EA GAMES Folder. 

- NO KEYS, OR NO-CD CRACKS NEEDED AT ALL! YAY!!! HAPPY DAYS!!! :)
- Enjoy, ALL :)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

~ Nolan (Texasrowley)
